txt.en:
'Do you see those two large tents up ahead there? The Angmarim keep supplies and goods within them. This must be the camp to support the eastern gate.

'If those tents were to catch fire, everything within them would go up as well and be destroyed. The troops at the gate would lose morale and be ineffective in just a few days. That would allow a perfect opening for an ambush.

'Set the two large tents ablaze to give them something to keep them busy for a while.'
'I will make sure to let the commander know that, thanks to you, we can earn a victory at the east gate in just a few short days.'
The Angmarim keep their stores and supplies in large tents.
The two large tents supply the eastern gate forces with supplies.
Orchalwë will be pleased to hear that the tents are ablaze.
